contextId.information: Here the word "darkness" may refer either to the world of the dead or to something that is difficult to understand. AT: "dies unexplainably" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
Here the word "darkness" refers to death. AT: "how many days that he will be dead." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])

contextId.quote: Then man goes to his eternal home
